ExtremeX-Scape August 1, 2016, 2:15pm #8

like for all platforms?

then in your signlink class make your cachedir void something like this,

	public static String findcachedir() {
		String cacheLocation(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/Cache name/");
		boolean exists = (new File(cacheLocation)).exists();
		if (exists) {
			return cacheLocation;
		} else {
			File f = new File(cacheLocation);
			f.mkDir();
			return cacheLocation;
		}
	}
